string-array.name: welcome_page_titles
string-array.item: A simple way to discover content

string-array.name: welcome_page_descriptions
string-array.item: Watch content from your apps like watching channels on TV.
Browse content from your apps with a familiar guide and friendly interface, \njust like channels on TV.
Add more channels by installing apps that offer live channels. \nFind compatible apps in Google Play Store by using the link within the TV menu.
Set up your newly installed channel sources to customize your channel list. \nChoose the Channel sources within the Settings menu to get started.
